name: Pressure relief mattress
description:
Rainbow Care QDC-300B is an anti-decubitus alternating air mattress system designed to help prevent bedsores and pressure ulcers for patients with limited mobility or who are bedridden. The mattress uses 20 alternating air chambers that inflate and deflate in cycles to continuously redistribute body weight, reducing prolonged pressure on any one area.

It features adjustable pressure settings to suit different body weights and comfort needs, allowing personalised support for the user. The system is powered by an ultra-quiet compressor that is easy to set up and suitable for use in home or care environments without disturbing rest.

The mattress is a strip-type design with 20 tubes and comes with a spare tube for maintenance convenience. It is lightweight, practical, and intended for long-term care to improve comfort and skin protection during extended bed rest.
